title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: My son, forget not my law; but let thine heart keep my commandments:
lineList.cn: 我儿，不要忘记我的法则。（或作指教）你心要谨守我的诫命。

lineList.en: For length of days, and long life, and peace, shall they add to thee.
lineList.cn: 因为他必将长久的日子，生命的年数，与平安，加给你。

lineList.en: Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart:
lineList.cn: 不可使慈爱诚实离开你。要系在你颈项上，刻在你心版上。

lineList.en: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.
lineList.cn: 这样，你必在神和世人眼前蒙恩宠，有聪明。

lineList.en: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
lineList.cn: 你要专心仰赖耶和华，不可倚靠自己的聪明。

lineList.en: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
lineList.cn: 在你一切所行的事上，都要认定他，他必指引你的路。

lineList.en: Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
lineList.cn: 不要自以为有智慧。要敬畏耶和华，远离恶事。

lineList.en: It shall be health to thy navel, and marrow to thy bones.
lineList.cn: 这便医治你的肚脐，滋润你的百骨。

lineList.en: Honour the LORD with thy substance, and with the firstfruits of all thine increase:
lineList.cn: 你要以财物，和一切初熟的土产，尊荣耶和华。

lineList.en: So shall thy barns be filled with plenty, and thy presses shall burst out with new wine.
lineList.cn: 这样，你的仓房，必充满有馀，你的酒榨，有新酒盈溢。

lineList.en: My son, despise not the chastening of the LORD; neither be weary of his correction:
lineList.cn: 我儿，你不可轻看耶和华的管教，（或作惩治）也不可厌烦他的责备。

lineList.en: For whom the LORD loveth he correcteth; even as a father the son in whom he delighteth.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华所爱的，他必责备。正如父亲责备所喜爱的儿子。

lineList.en: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.
lineList.cn: 得智慧，得聪明的，这人便为有福。

lineList.en: For the merchandise of it is better than the merchandise of silver, and the gain thereof than fine gold.
lineList.cn: 因为得智慧胜过得银子，其利益强如精金。

lineList.en: She is more precious than rubies: and all the things thou canst desire are not to be compared unto her.
lineList.cn: 比珍珠（或作红宝石）宝贵。你一切所喜爱的，都不足比较。

lineList.en: Length of days is in her right hand; and in her left hand riches and honour.
lineList.cn: 他右手有长寿。左手有富贵。

lineList.en: Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace.
lineList.cn: 他的道是安乐，他的路全是平安。

lineList.en: She is a tree of life to them that lay hold upon her: and happy is every one that retaineth her.
lineList.cn: 他与持守他的作生命树。持定他的俱各有福。

lineList.en: The LORD by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.
lineList.cn: 耶和华以智慧立地。以聪明定天。

lineList.en: By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
lineList.cn: 以知识使深渊裂开，使天空滴下甘露。

lineList.en: My son, let not them depart from thine eyes: keep sound wisdom and discretion:
lineList.cn: 我儿，要谨守真智慧和谋略。不可使他离开你的眼目。

lineList.en: So shall they be life unto thy soul, and grace to thy neck.
lineList.cn: 这样，他必作你的生命，颈项的美饰。

lineList.en: Then shalt thou walk in thy way safely, and thy foot shall not stumble.
lineList.cn: 你就坦然行路，不至碰脚。

lineList.en: When thou liest down, thou shalt not be afraid: yea, thou shalt lie down, and thy sleep shall be sweet.
lineList.cn: 你躺下，必不惧怕。你躺卧，睡得香甜。

lineList.en: Be not afraid of sudden fear, neither of the desolation of the wicked, when it cometh.
lineList.cn: 忽然来的惊恐，不要害怕。恶人遭毁灭，也不要恐惧。

lineList.en: For the LORD shall be thy confidence, and shall keep thy foot from being taken.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华是你所倚靠的。他必保守你的脚不陷入网罗。

lineList.en: Withhold not good from them to whom it is due, when it is in the power of thine hand to do it.
lineList.cn: 你手若有行善的力量，不可推辞，就当向那应得的人施行。

lineList.en: Say not unto thy neighbour, Go, and come again, and to morrow I will give; when thou hast it by thee.
lineList.cn: 你那里若有现成的，不可对邻舍说，去吧，明天再来，我必给你。

lineList.en: Devise not evil against thy neighbour, seeing he dwelleth securely by thee.
lineList.cn: 你的邻舍，既在你附近安居，你不可设计害他。

lineList.en: Strive not with a man without cause, if he have done thee no harm.
lineList.cn: 人未曾加害与你，不可无故与他相争。

lineList.en: Envy thou not the oppressor, and choose none of his ways.
lineList.cn: 不可嫉妒强暴的人，也不可选择他所行的路。

lineList.en: For the froward is abomination to the LORD: but his secret is with the righteous.
lineList.cn: 因为乖僻人为耶和华所憎恶。正直人为他所亲密。

lineList.en: The curse of the LORD is in the house of the wicked: but he blesseth the habitation of the just.
lineList.cn: 耶和华咒诅恶人的家庭，赐福与义人的居所。

lineList.en: Surely he scorneth the scorners: but he giveth grace unto the lowly.
lineList.cn: 他讥诮那好讥诮的人，赐恩给谦卑的人。

lineList.en: The wise shall inherit glory: but shame shall be the promotion of fools.
lineList.cn: 智慧人必承受尊荣。愚昧人高升也成为羞辱。
